alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 11:59PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of southwestern Benton, northeastern Crawford, Washington, southeastern Delaware and Adair Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1158 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from 5 miles west of Hindsville to 3 miles northwest of West Siloam Springs. These winds will occur ahead of any thunderstorms. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Siloam Springs... Stilwell... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Lincoln... Westville... Greenland... West Siloam Springs... Winslow... Watts... Adair State Park... Cincinnati... Maryetta... Devils Den State Park... Brentwood... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 41 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
